content: I’m not sure what specific type of giveaway James Altucher recommended, but you might think about adding a free download with some great information in it as something you give subscribers when they give you their email address rather than having something that one or two random people will get. An up front download immediately after subscription is less likely to entice someone who just signs up for lists to get free stuff and more likely to attract people who are curious about your writing and want more.
